Deficiency Narrative: The two staff files that were reviewed were incomplete and has some of the required documents missing.   Missing documents included; application, drug tests, operations policy acknowledgments.
Correction Narrative:
Email from the operations was received with the corrective plan.  
The Program Director reviewed these standard numbers with the administrative team and discussed the importance of making sure that files are to be completed prior to their start date for each employee with Clairefontaine Care Center. All files are to be audited on a weekly basis to ensure that revised or updated documents are signed right away.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection, it was observed that the medication was not double locked, as the cabinet was unlocked. The keys for the medication cabinet were found
Staff failed to intervene when youth were involved in a physical altercation.
Correction Narrative:
The agency provided corrective plan for citation. 
Each staff member will be trained in policy and procedures during the onboarding process and every week after that, with it being started on April 1, 2025.  Program director reviewed the standards at training with all staff member during meeting. Training was provided to ensure the importance of supervision while caring for children in care.  Program director will oversee that all staff are trained.  If staff are unable to provide the supervision, the director will move to take staff off schedule or termination.

Deficiency Narrative: The personal file had some required documents. Missing document included the Job description, Orientation, the Notarized Licensing Affidavit for Application for Employment, the statement signed and dated by the employee regarding reporting suspected child abuse/neglect.  and documentation showing the date of emplyment.
Correction Narrative: Corrective action plan from the opera will etion. Action plan- The CCC will ensure all required documents be collected prior to the employee's first active day on duty during the pre-employment process. Personal files will be completed prior to employee's start date but no later than 24 hours after first active day. LCCA will ensure all personal files are completed within 24 hours of an employee being active and on duty. The LCCA and Program Director will work in tandem to ensure this is not a reoccurring issue.
